task: Write a Python function that validates if a string is a valid AWS S3 bucket name according to AWS naming rules (3-63 characters, lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, must start and end with letter or number)
Create a JSON object representing an AWS IAM policy that allows a principal to perform GetObject and PutObject actions on a specific S3 bucket ARN
Write a regular expression that matches valid AWS EC2 instance IDs (format: i- followed by 8 or 17 hexadecimal characters)
